title: Architectural design and affecting factors of MXene-based textronics for real-world application
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16093-16116
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01820F, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Md. Reazuddin Repon, Daiva Mikučionienė, Tamal Krishna Paul, Jehan Y. Al-Humaidi, Mohammed M. Rahman, Tarekul Islam, Sharof Shukhratov
New emerging 2D transition metal carbide and nitride, known as MXene, nanomaterials are highly considered for developing textronics. This review summarizes the recent advancements in the architectural design of MXene-based fibers, yarn, and fabric.
